rows.label: tev030101_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030101_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Ackwar about the Ma-non.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030101_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030101_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Ackwar if anything is troubling him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030101_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Ackwar about the attack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030101_MSG0001
rows.name:
The Ma-non are mostly pacifists, you know?
We try to to avoid fights.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030101_MSG0002
rows.name:
But when I saw you humans risking your lives to save
each other, I think I had an epiphany?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030101_MSG0003
rows.name:
I realized the importance of keeping the people I care
about safe, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030101_MSG0004
rows.name:
So that's why I asked Commander Vandham to to let
me join BLADE. Does that make sense?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030101_MSG0005
rows.name:
We Ma-non are not quite as robust as you humans,
but we are the smartest species in all the galaxy,
pretty much? I can pick things up as I go.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030101_MSG0006
rows.name:
Just wait, okay? Soon I'll be a masterful Mediator
resolving conflicts all across the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030101_MSG0009
rows.name:
My BLADE work has been keeping me so so busy,
you know? I barely see my dear sweetheart Yuyu...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030101_MSG0010
rows.name:
When I get my next break, maybe I'll take her on a
date to Army Pizza?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030101_MSG0011
rows.name:
Of course, I still have a lot to learn, so I may not have
earned a break, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030101_MSG0012
rows.name:
One day I'll be so good at my job that I can finish
early and spend lots and lots of time with my Yuyu,
you know what I mean?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030101_MSG0020
rows.name:
When New LA came under attack, all the Ma-non were
scared and and confused, you know? Big time panic.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030101_MSG0021
rows.name:
So I used my powers of quick thinking to devise
a strategy—I told the Ma-non that I had filled our
entire ship with pizza![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030101_MSG0022
rows.name:
Everyone piled right onto the ship, and my superiors in
BLADE commended me. Pretty clever, don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030101_MSG0023
rows.name:
Of course, once the crisis had subsided, the other
Ma-non had many many sternly worded complaints
about the ship's notable...lack of pizza?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030101_MSG0024
rows.name:
Regardless, I really feel like a true BLADE now,
you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030101_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Ackwar about the Ganglion threat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030101_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Ackwar about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030101_MSG0025
rows.name:
While we do need to deal with the Ganglion's direct
assaults on the city, we must also remain mindful of
other threats as well, don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030101_MSG0026
rows.name:
For example, how did Powell manage to get his hands
on that Skell?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030101_MSG0027
rows.name:
He may be ex-military, but BLADE isn't stupid, right?
They keep a tight watch on their Skells.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030101_MSG0028
rows.name:
So I figured Powell must have had help, you know?
Well, when I followed up on this theory,
I discovered something quite...unsettling?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030101_MSG0029
rows.name:
It seems he received assistance from other elements in
the city—non-human types, if you follow me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030101_MSG0030
rows.name:
I am quite certain the Ganglion had a hand in
manipulating Powell's derangement to their advantage.
And cleverness makes them dangerous, don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030101_MSG0033
rows.name:
Admittedly, some family members of Powell's Ma-non
victims have developed a markedly negative opinion
of humans...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030101_MSG0034
rows.name:
But I intend to step in where I can and and and make
things right, if such a goal is possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030101_MSG0035
rows.name:
After all, I can relate. I once had my own proverbial
bone to pick with humans because of Yuyu, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030101_MSG0036
rows.name: If it were not for you, I might still hate humans?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030101_MSG0037
rows.name:
So I suppose I must thank you, right? Right!
Let's team up again and bring the light of reason to
this fine fine city, okay?[ST:wait ]
